page.title: 01An Introduction To Steyning
page.content: Steyning has a long history stretching back to Roman times.Saint Cuthman is the Christian Saxon who is closely linked with Steyning. New buildings are being errected everywhere.It is expanding rapidly. Most people are tending to go to work in bigger towns.Although some citizens own shops and work locally. The Steyning area is attractive and many tourists come in the summer. It is situated in a convenient place being just next to the Sussex Downs and near to the sea.Sometimes thick fog covers the town. The town of Steyning is very independent having its own public services and sporting facilities as well as a variety of shops and a big school. The area around Steyning is largely mixed agricultural land.
